EmailTemplate.name: What's Hot @HAT_Irina.Draft 1
EmailTemplate.subject: What's HOT at HAT this month
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> HONEYWELL AEROSPACE TRADING MAY 2017 LEARN FROM OUR EXPERTS WHAT'S HOT AT HAT THIS MONTH Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT) would like to invite you to visit our stand A24 during the upcoming AP&M Europe in London on the 31st May – 1st June. HAT’s highly experienced team will be available to discuss all potential solutions for your stock requirements as well as provide additional info on all current B737NG and A320 stock available from our procurement activities.
Book today for a face-to-face meeting with your HAT Account Manager, see details below. LINDA KODRAZI
EMAIL: Linda.kodrazi@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Linda.kodrazi@honeywell.com]]> MOBILE: +420 734 644 250 TERRITORY: Southern Europe (Spain, Portugal, Italy, Cyprus, Greece, Malta, Turkey, Balkans), Northern Europe (Scandinavia, Baltic), Pakistan, UAE, Saudi Arabia MAGDA BLOUIN
EMAIL: Magda.blouin@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Magda.blouin@honeywell.com]]>
MOBILE: + 420 730 551 772
TERRITORY: France, Benelux, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Poland, Hungary, Israel, Russia/CIS MICHAEL LA SALA
EMAIL: Michael.lasala@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Michael.lasala@honeywell.com]]> MOBILE: +420 725 876 782 TERRITORY: Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Kuwait, Iraq, Lebanon, Jordan JAMES MCNORTON
